title.rendered: Top-up degree induction at our Harrow campus

content.rendered:
On 30th September, Regent College London welcomed the September 2019 cohort of the BA (Hons) Business Entrepreneurship Top-up degree validated by the University of Northampton to its Harrow campus. This was the first opportunity for the students to meet their classmates and get to know each other. Students had the opportunity to meet the academic and support staff.

Regent College London also offers a full degree in Business Entrepreneurship, awarded by the University of Northampton at its Harrow campus.

Harrow Campus

Visit Campus

School of Business and Enterprise

Visit School
